channel.title: C++, VB, and game programming board!
channel.description:
I think there should be a C++ and possibly VB board, look at the posts in general programming, what are they? C++ and VB. Java gets its own board so why shouldnt C++ and VB? This would give the oppurtunity for more people to learn more languages, which is always better ;D ;D
Also, it seems as if many people try to make there own games, whether online, offline, RTS, or even just a simple game such as a replica of pong, there should be a board for Game/Program Programming ;D

item.title: C++, VB, and game programming board!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Mopar, remember when Starblaster created that Tutorials board? Only about 4 or 5 tutorials were there for around 2 weeks. Then suddenly a lot of people started writing tutorials. And now after a couple months, there are 5 or 6 different pages filled with them.

Maybe if you make the board, and blow on the light flame, maybe just maybe, it will ignite. But we need that one person, that one person to make a difference. That one person who has control of the forum, to go into the “Advanced Options” and click on “Create new board” and call it something like C++ board and add it right next to general programming.

Just one man… just one… can make that difference.

Read full topic
item.source: C++, VB, and game programming board!

item.description:
@sdouble wrote:

<3 HacktiveX

MrWicked, I see you have an R count of 54. Should you not be a community member? I have contacted mods/admins (yes, admins control it, mods can post in the staff board that it needs to be done) numerous times and they haven’t given you CM status yet. Did you do something bad? Do they hate you? Is there a reason they are ignoring me?

item.title: C++, VB, and game programming board!
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

MrWicked, you can only make ActiveX .dlls in VB. Those don’t constitute as VB making its own .dlls.

Read full topic
item.source: C++, VB, and game programming board!

item.title: C++, VB, and game programming board!
item.dc:creator: @MrWicked MrWicked
item.description:
@MrWicked wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:12, topic:8496”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=12048.msg136189#msg136189 date=1155045008]
haha is VB even an OO language? since its loved by noobs i would have thought it to be procedural xD
[/quote]You can’t make .dlls with it either :([/quote]

You can make DLL’s in VB.

VB is a language just as much as any other.

It for sure is obviously not the best language lol, but it is still a language.

But C++ is much better, and yes I can code in C++ and VB. So my statement is valid lol.

Read full topic
